! Title: Hide Bilibili Content Farms
! Description: Hide all content farm accounts on Bilibili
! Last modified: 2024-01-25 01:53
! Expires: 1 hours (update frequency)
www.bilibili.com##.video-page-card-small:has(div.card-box > div.info > div.upname > a > .name:has-text(赵八仙))
